title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 606.70 - Payment of fees and charges
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 606.70 - Payment of fees and charges

State Regulations

Each applicant for a permit shall pay the full amount
of charges or fees required, whether the permit is effective for a full
calendar year or only a fractional part thereof. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
606.70

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
